entries.meaning: (Canada, US) A spotlight or lamp mounted on a car.
examples: It was a long, low roadster, with a jacklight.

verbs.description: jacklight (third-person singular simple present jacklights, present participle jacklighting, simple past and past participle jacklighted or jacklit)

entries.meaning: (hunting, US, Canada) To shine a jacklight or spotlight on an animal, usually a deer, to aid in hunting at night.
